Name: oprcom
Description: commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprjoin
Description: join selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprlsortop
Description: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the left-hand operand

Name: oprnegate
Description: negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprrest
Description: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprrsortop
Description: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the right-hand operand
